titles: The gamester As it vvas presented by her Majesties Servants at the private house in Drury-Lane. Written by Iames Shirly.
author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Norton, for Andrew Crooke, and William Cooke,
notes: K2v begins "As when she ..". Early variant: K2v omits this line and begins "Wi. I am ..".
The title page is mostly in the same setting as STC 22442.
